Articles.Content:
Hello, I recently bought KSP and I am having problem with it. It sometimes randomly crash when I press Launch button in rocket builder.
https://gyazo.com/f31fd68cae7f664810094c15e9570195
My system specs:
Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
16 GB of RAM
Windows 10 64bit
